entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Red Lake

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
